tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tax_rates (
  year INT,
  tax_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE historical_tax_rates (
  tax_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  tax_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE tax_payers (
  taxpayer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  taxpayer_name VARCHAR(50),
  total_income DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE tax_payments (
  payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  taxpayer_id INT,
  payment_amount DECIMAL,
  payment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE tax_trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  trend_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE tax_payments (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tax_id INT,
    taxpayer_id INT,
    payment_amount DECIMAL,
    payment_date TIMESTAMP
);
